page.title: 20Stephen's Day:Chatteris
page.content: I usually wake up at 7.30am, get dressed and go down to wash. Then I have my breakfast which is wholemeal (granary) toast and jam with coffee. I often read my Eagle comic or the newspaper during breakfast. I then clean my teeth and walk to Cromwell School sometimes with my dad who teaches there. If it is a day when I have music I have to take my French horn to practise. When I get to school I meet my friends in a form room. When the bell rings at 8.50am I go to my form room for registration. Before normal lessons we have a school, house or year assembly. I go home for dinner between 11.55 and 1.10pm. Afternoon lessons finish at 3.45. After school I often shop for my mum and do my homework. After tea at 6.00 I see my friends. Bed is at 9.00.
